title: Root shell on a credit card terminal
author: stgl
aiHeadline: Hackers find new way to steal your money: taking over credit card machines and laughing all the way to the bank.

title: Figma Slides Is a Beautiful Disaster

title: Cinematography of “Andor”
author: rcarmo
aiHeadline: The cinematography of 'Andor' is so good, it makes you forget you're watching a show about spies and politics.

title: RenderFormer: Neural rendering of triangle meshes with global illumination

aiHeadline: RenderFormer: the latest in neural rendering that will make your graphics look amazing, but only if you can figure out how to use it without pulling your hair out.
